definition: "eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
unit (forming an entity)/element/(in a residential building) entrance or staircase

sentences.english: Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能开一张不可撤消的跟单信用证吗？

sentences.english: How do I submit an expense report?
On the third floor they are selling linens.
What advice do you have for anyone looking to start a collection of single malts ?
sentences.chinese: 你对那些想开始收藏单麦芽威士忌的人有何建议？

sentences.english: It is the customer's responsibility to close out hedges if they wish to do so.
sentences.chinese: 这是客户的责任来将锁单平仓，如果他们愿意这么做。

sentences.english: The bladder is thin-walled and closed by a one-way valve.
sentences.chinese: 浮囊具有薄壁的结构并且通过单方向的阀门关闭。

sentences.english: Helium is a monatomic chemically inert gas.
Scientists believe it is a main source of the G ring and its single ring arc.
sentences.chinese: 科学家认为，它是一个主要来源国和它的单环环弧。

sentences.english: Stationary anode, single focus, and bridge silicon rectification, The X-ray generator is an oil-immersed self-cooled unit.
sentences.chinese: 固定阳极，单焦点，桥式硅整流，油浸自冷组合式。

sentences.english: Space is at a premium in a one-bedroomed apartment.
sentences.chinese: 单居室公寓的空间是很有限的。

sentences.english: The song is from Goodnight & Go single.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌曲是从晚安转到单。

sentences.english: In single-dispatch polymorphism, the object that "owns" a method is singled out.
sentences.chinese: 在单分派多态性中，挑选出“拥有”方法的对象。

sentences.english: This kind of single-lung fish can live up to 12 hours when out of water.
sentences.chinese: 这种单肺鱼离开水面能生存多达12小时。

sentences.english: The most common type of fuel pump is the single-action, diaphragm-type mechanical pump.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的燃油泵是单膜片机械式的。

sentences.english: A kind of making real-color rainbow hologram with single-wavelength and single-beam are presented. First make three films of rainbow encoded.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种单波长单光束真彩色彩虹全息图制作技术。

sentences.english: A kind of making real-color rainbow hologram with single-wavelength and single-beam are presented. First make three films of rainbow encoded.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种单波长单光束真彩色彩虹全息图制作技术。

definition: the only son of a family/(functional programming or philosophy) monad
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to take a customer's order/(of a taxi driver) to accept a booking/(of a delivery rider) to accept a delivery job

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
matching/fitting in with/compatible with/to correspond/to fit/to conform to/rapport/to coordinate with/to act in concert with/to cooperate/to become man and wife/to combine parts of machine
a tax declaration form/a tax return
